[[inst_v_shfli_bfly]]
==== V.SHFLI.BFLY

*Syntax:* v.shfli.bfly SrcL.<T>, imm, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Shuffle (butterfly): permutes vector elements using immediate indices.
